mapper.insert:
insert into channel_stock (id, type, stock_no, specification, amount, channel_price, base_price, discount, brand, remark) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.stockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.channelPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.basePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into erp_order (id,name, order_no, source_order_no, trans_way, trans_no, trans_money, amount, source_type, remark, stock_no, specification) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sourceOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into error_erp_order_model (id, rowNumber, message) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rownumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.message,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from erp_order where source_order_no = #{sourceNo} and stock_no = #{stockNo} and specification = #{specification}

select count(*) from erp_order
where order_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or source_order_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
